entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
